key_risks: Regulatory challenges including antitrust scrutiny and fines
Profitability concerns due to high operational costs and inconsistent earnings
Intense competition in ride-hailing, food delivery, and fintech sectors
Driver and merchant disputes over earnings and commissions
Legal risks from securities litigation and ethical concerns
controversies: Antitrust fines in Singapore and Malaysia
Securities litigation over misleading statements during SPAC merger
Surge pricing during emergencies and monopolistic practices
environmental_issues: Commitment to carbon neutrality by 2040 with eco-friendly transport options
social_issues: Driver and merchant complaints about low earnings and high commissions
Reputational risks from surge pricing and monopolistic behavior
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny over monopolistic practices and data privacy concerns
Legal risks from securities litigation and ethical concerns
